review.title: “JJPI provided tons of experience yet decreases tons of morale.”
review.pros: Pros – Your able to communicate with individuals with similar interests as you and assist in bettering the community through offering top quality therapy.
review.cons: Cons – Disrespect towards employers, poor morale, minimal resources and poor management.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Utilize the sanctuary model to build up employees as a means to provide better service.

review.title: “Disfunctional unit of this organization”
review.pros: Pros – It may be that other units function well and still have a good reputation
review.cons: Cons – The partial hospital program for sex offenders is abysmal, both adult and adolescent.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Please get help. It is a lack of respect for the clients to have such an ugly environment in such disrepair. Respect your employees by giving more autonomy, better training, and better compensation.
